TopicTitle: Couldn't find time to get into this game seriously until now!

Articles.Content:
Hello,

My name is Neil. I've already played KSP before joining the forum, but I was always busy with school and special projects. Now that I'm out doing an internship, I finally have the time (and the computing power) to dive into this game for real!

I'm probably going to try out a lot of mods.

Any advice for a n00b like me?

thanks!

Welcome to the forums!

One of the places you might want to look for good advice is my Drawing Board, which is linked in my signature. I've been compiling a list of what I believe to be some of the best tutorials and other resources this community has to offer, many of which are specifically targeted at new players. If you have questions, feel free to also ask in the Gameplay Questions and Tutorials section of the forum as well.

Hope this helps!
